title: Car crashes into SBS Transit bus along Upper Changi Road North after beating red light
desc: A 33-year-old car driver crashed head-on into an SBS Transit bus after running a red light along Upper Changi Road North on Feb 14. Dashcam footage of the accident posted on Facebook on Tuesday (Feb 17) by SGRV Admin shows a silver Honda civic speeding past a red light. An SBS Transit bus service 5 was making a right turn...

title: Murray: I was disappointed Rassie left
desc: Former Munster and Ireland scrumhalf Conor Murray admits he wonders what might have been had Rassie Erasmus stayed in Limerick a little longer.

title: Darwin prisoner Clinton Daylight found, returned to custody two days after being freed from jail by mistake
desc: A 52-year-old inmate who was mistakenly released from the Darwin Correctional Centre two months before his sentence was due to end, due to an "administration error" by prison staff, has been found following a police search.

title: Cedi gains not enough to reduce prices as manufacturers still recovering losses
desc: President of the Association of Ghana Industries (AGI), Dr Kofi Nsiah-Poku, says the recent appreciation of the cedi is not enough to trigger immediate price reductions, as manufacturers are still recovering from heavy losses incurred during the period of a weak currency.
